title: LOL Client Causes Computer to Freeze - Preseason Patch
body:
Since the Preseason Patch, my client will freeze forcing me to do a hard restart (holding down the power button). If it doesn't freeze before I enter a game, there is a possibility of a complete crash, blue screen, or auto restart mid-game. 

I'm playing on Windows 10 64-bit with an ATI Radeon card.

I've tried un- and reinstalling LOL and updating my graphics driver. Neither have helped. 

Has anyone else experienced this? Any ideas on what to do?

replies.body: I've often seen freezing cases caused by the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) bar.  Disable that and test it in a custom game.  The blue screen might indicate a more severe hardware issue too.  :(  Double check your airvents and check for overheating, it could be the culprit!
